1.question: Robin has 9 packages of gum. There are 15 pieces in each package. How many pieces of gum does Robin have?

3.question: I have 80 cents to buy candy. If each gumdrop costs 4 cents, how many gumdrops can I buy?

2.question: 63 people are going to the zoo. There are 3 cars to take people to the zoo. How many will go in each car if the same number go in each car?

5.question: 58 children are taking a bus to the zoo. They sit 2 children in every seat. How many seats will the children need in all?

4.question: Maggi had 3 packages of cupcakes. There are 4 cupcakes in each package. She ate 5 cupcakes. How many are left?
